roleset.name: fail to notice

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Lehman overlooks the fact that the Navy possesses its own air force ( the carrier fleet ) and its own army ( the Marines ) , which in turn [] has its own air force .
example.arg: fact that the Navy possesses its own air force ( the carrier fleet ) and its own army ( the Marines ) , which in turn [] has its own air force

example.name: passive
example.text: But that rule is being virtually overlooked [*]by Wall Street , which [*T*-2] is concentrating on [*-3] coping with the deduction issue .
example.arg: Wall Street , which [*T*-2] is concentrating on [*-3] coping with the deduction issue

roleset.note: OVERLOOK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overlook' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from overlook.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: be oriented in a certain direction

example.name: transitive
example.text: In his office overlooking the runway of Shannon Airport , Mr. Ovcharenko enthusiastically throws out what he calls [] `` just ideas '' :

roleset.note: OVERLOOK-V NOTES: frames created by Olga (from overlook.02-v)
